text: Gareth Gwenlan OBE (26 April 1937 - 9 May 2016) was a British television producer and director. He was best known for his work on shows including The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin, To the Manor Born, Only Fools and Horses, and High Hopes. He was born in Brecon, Wales. Gwenlan was made Officer of the Order of the British Empire (OBE) in the 2013. Gwenlan died on 9 May 2016 in Hertfordshire, England, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2016 deaths Category:British television directors Category:British television producers
title: Gareth Gwenlan
